rule_1.description: The sum of all debit amounts must equal the sum of all credit amounts
rule_1.notes: This rule ensures the fundamental accounting equation is maintained

rule_2.description: Each row's Balance must equal (Debit - Credit)
rule_2.notes: Ensures individual GL account balances are correctly calculated

rule_3.description: Each G/L Acct/BP Code must be unique
rule_3.notes: Prevents duplicate GL codes which can cause reporting errors

rule_4.description: All rows must have valid codes, names, and numeric values
rule_4.notes: Ensures completeness of trial balance data

rule_5.rule_name: Logical Balance Signs by Account Type
rule_5.description: Assets (1xxxxx): Positive | Liabilities (2xxxxx): Negative | Revenue (3xxxxx): Negative | Expenses (4xxxxx): Positive | Equity (5xxxxx): Negative
rule_5.notes: Validates account balances have expected signs based on account type

rule_6.notes: Ensures the fundamental accounting equation balances

tolerance_settings.description: Allowed variance as percentage (0.001%) and absolute rupee tolerance (0.01)
